meanings.definition: Jowars (noun): A type of grain used for food.
meanings.sent1: The farmer harvested the jowars from his field.
meanings.sent2: I bought some jowars to make a healthy meal.
meanings.sent3: The jowars danced in the pot as they cooked.
meanings.sent4: The jowars were like tiny pearls in the bowl.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the jowars filled the kitchen with warmth.

meanings.definition: Jowars (verb): To grind or crush into a powder.
meanings.sent1: She jowars the spices to make a flavorful blend.
meanings.sent2: The miller jowars the wheat to make flour.
meanings.sent3: The chef jowars the nuts for the dessert.
meanings.sent4: The old machine jowars the rocks into fine dust.
meanings.sent5: The windmill jowars the grains effortlessly.
